title: Green Apple Salsa
directions: In a medium-sized bowl, whisk together lime juice, olive oil, rice vinegar, honey, and salt.
Add apple, onion, pepper, and cilantro to bowl and toss well to coat.
Serve immediately. Refrigerate leftovers in an airtight container and use within three days.
ingredients: 1 large Stemilt Granny Smith apple, diced
